products.productName: Pipette Bathtime Duo Kit, Fragrance Free - Wash Tear-Free and Moisturize Set with Renewable Plant-Derived Squalane, 2-Piece Set
products.description: Pipette hypoallergenic Baby Shampoo and Wash and Baby Lotion is made using clean, plant-derived ingredients. Pipette fragrance-free Baby Shampoo and Wash gently cleanse your baby's hair and delicate skin without drying or causing irritation. Pipette fragrance-free Baby Lotion safely nurtures your baby’s skin and helps increase natural moisture levels of baby’s delicate skin.

products.productName: Pipette Baby Travel Kit - Trial Size Toiletries, Baby Gift Set, Hypoallergenic, Free of Synthetic Fragrances, Cruelty-Free, 4 Products + Travel Pouch
Grab Green 99% Natural Baby Lotion, Calming Chamomile Fragrance—with Essential Oils, 8 fl oz (2-Pack), Plant-Based & Biodegradable, Daily Moisturizer
products.description: Grab Green Baby Lotion is specifically formulated for baby’s delicate skin with oodles of moisturizers to hydrate and moisturize baby’s delicate skin including organic cucumber extract, organic chamomile flower, oat kernel extract, sunflower seed extract and pro-vitamin B5—which has a natural ability to moisturize, soothe, heal and regenerate the skin. 99% naturally-derived and biodegradable, this daily moisturizer in our Calming Chamomile scent is made with essential oils cedarwood, citronella java, geranium, mandarin, orange, patchouli and petitgrain, and made WITHOUT parabens, phthalates or dyes.Thoughtful, delightful design includes clear use instructions and glitter accents, and is packaged in a highly-recyclable #5 tube. We believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. We responsibly source high-quality plant & mineral-based ingredients and work directly with our team of organic chemists to create the most effective, naturally-derived, non-toxic formulas.

products.productName: Alimed Freezer Pop Pedialyte Variety 2.1 oz
products.description: Pedialyte Electrolyte Solution Freezer Pops help prevent dehydration in both kids and adults by quickly replenishing lost fluids and electrolytes. From the #1 pharmacist and pediatrician recommended brand for hydration, Pedialyte Electrolyte Solution Freezer Pops promote fluid absorption more effectively than sports drinks, juice or even water. Includes four great flavors: Grape, Blue Raspberry, Cherry and Orange. Feel better fast with Pedialyte! Pack of 2

products.productName: Pipette Mineral Sunscreen - SPF 50 Broad Spectrum Baby Sunblock with Non-Nano Zinc, UVB/UVA Non-Toxic Sun Protection for Kids & Sensitive Skin, 4 fl oz
products.description: USE PIPETTE SUNSCREEN FOR BABIES: Apply our SPF 50 to protect your baby’s delicate skin from the sun’s harmful rays. This baby-friendly, reef-friendly natural sunscreen uses 100% mineral, non-nano zinc oxide for broad spectrum UVA/UVB sun protection, making it a perfect infant sunscreen USE PIPETTE SUNSCREEN FOR TODDLERS: The lightweight, fast-absorbing, non-sticky formula of this toddler sunscreen rubs in easily—crucial for on-the-move little ones! Plant extracts also moisturize and calm the effect of infrared rays.

products.description: Easy-Clean Lid is designed to eliminate nooks and crannies where dirt and grime could get trapped Pop-up straw features a spill-proof valve that prevents spills even when spout is open BPA-free plastic lid and body are top-rack dishwasher-safe for easy cleanups Straw is a cinch to disassemble for thorough cleaning but stays tethered so there are no loose parts to misplace Kids enjoy an easy one-handed drinking experience at the push of a button For ages 3 and up, Chocking Hazard small parts

products.productName: Aveeno Baby Soothing Hydration Creamy Oil for Dry and Sensitive Skin, Fragrance- and Steroid-Free, 8 Fl Oz
products.description: Help prevent and temporarily protect chafed, chapped, or cracked skin with Aveeno Baby Soothing Hydration Creamy Oil. Specially designed for baby's delicate skin, this creamy baby oil is clinically proven to hydrate dry, sensitive skin for 24 hours. The moisturizing body oil contains 100percent pure oat oil to strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, antioxidant vitamin E to help maintain skin's moisture barrier, and dimethicone 1.2percent, to help keep baby's skin protected. Hypoallergenic, and pH-balanced, the gentle and nourishing creamy oil is fragrance-, paraben-, phthalate-, phenoxyethanol-, and steroid-free. Hydrating oat creamy oil comes from Aveeno, a Pediatrician and Dermatologist recommended brand. Aveeno offers skincare products that soothe, nourish and protect your baby's delicate skin.
